Articles.Content:
The Delta IV Heavy

I really like the design of the Delta IV Heavy, so I decided to make one in KSP. It has no problems getting to a Kerbosynchronous orbit. I have also used it to get to Minmus and the MÃƒÂ¼n. I have a slideshow of me getting to a Kerbosynchronous orbit with it here: http://imgur.com/a/WvLB3. One thing I really like about it is that once you're at a Kerbosynchronous apoapsis, you can do a quick retrograde burn, and jettison the satellite. You can then use the satellite's H and N RCS to get back into a Kerbosynchronous orbit. This will help prevent debris cluttering Kerbin.

EDIT: Wow, just used it to get to the MÃƒÂ¼n, then to Minmus, then back to Kerbin. Never had a ship that could do that before.

Name: Delta IV Heavy

Creator: Brad

Mods Required: MechJeb (unless you change the pod in the .craft file)

Screenshots/videos: http://imgur.com/a/WvLB3

Download Link: http://www./?7hochcc2548lw8i

I can upload a .craft of the rocket without a MechJeb pod. Just tell me what you'd like, and I'll get to it as soon as I can.

Edited August 15, 2012 by Brad

Looks realy heavy...

Whats your TWR on the pad ?
